main: S2 consumes most of her {status:Charge} Count using 10 for Coin Power (consuming HP to go up to 10 at 5-9), and at 3+ Reson can consume any remaining Count to deal more damage on her last coin.
Use S3 to setup S2. It generates enough {status:Charge} Count for S2's conditionals and inflicts {status:VioletTakeDamageUp} next turn.
other: Gains {status:Charge} Potency for every 10 Count spent. Potency increases her S3's {status:Charge} Count generation, Coin Power, and damage.
Her passive increases damage based on {status:Charge} Potency and gives herself and 2 allies {status:Charge} Count based on her Potency.
Her S1 both produces and consumes a small amount of {status:Charge}.

1021001.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter
At 2+ [Charge], deal +([Charge] x 3)% damage (max 15%)

On Kill, this unit and 1 ally with the least [Charge] Count gains [Charge] Count equal to [Charge] (max 3, prioritizes allies that consume or gain [Charge])
1021001.name: Electrocurrent Dismantling

1021011.desc:
Gain 1 [Charge] every time this unit consumes 10 cumulative [Charge] Count in this Encounter
At 2+ [Charge], deal +([Charge] x 3)% damage (max 15%)
- If the target is at less than 50% HP, deal +([Charge] x 5)% additionally increased damage (max 25%)

On Kill, this unit and 2 allies with the least [Charge] Count gains [Charge] Count equal to ([Charge] + 2) (max 5, prioritizes allies that consume or gain [Charge])
1021011.name: Electrocurrent Dismantling

1021021.desc: When 1 ally with the least [Charge] Count kills an enemy, the ally gains +2 [Charge] Count (once per turn, prioritizes allies that consume or gain [Charge])
1021021.name: Auxiliary Dismantling Current

1021031.desc: When 1 ally with the least [Charge] Count kills an enemy, the ally gains +3 [Charge] Count (once per turn, prioritizes allies that consume or gain [Charge])
1021031.name: Auxiliary Dismantling Current

[WhenUse] Consume 10 [Charge] Count to gain Coin Power +1
